name: Island (itch) (Futuresoft)
description:
You fell asleep at home in your bed, and woke up on an island, in the middle of the ocean. No, it's not a dream. It feels too real.

"I like that kind of game where you need to escape or solve a puzzle for a truth. But this... This created a new idea for game development. 9 stars, each deserved." - GameTime
